name: AVPlayerViewController
desc: An object that displays the video content from a player object along with system-supplied playback controls.

items.name: player
items.desc: The player that provides the media content for the player view controller.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The delegate object for the player view controller.

items.name: showsPlaybackControls
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player view controller shows playback controls.

items.name: playbackControlsIncludeInfoViews
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver shows information views when requested by the user.

items.name: playbackControlsIncludeTransportBar
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver shows the transport bar and related controls.

items.name: allowsPictureInPicturePlayback
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player view controller allows Picture in Picture playback on iPad.

items.name: contentOverlayView
items.desc: A view displayed between the video content and the playback controls.

items.name: entersFullScreenWhenPlaybackBegins
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the player automatically displays in full screen when the play button is tapped.

items.name: exitsFullScreenWhenPlaybackEnds
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player exits full screen when playback ends.

items.name: isReadyForDisplay
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating that the first video frame, of the current item of the associated AVPlayer object, is ready for display.

items.name: videoBounds
items.desc: The current size and position of the video image as displayed within the bounds of the player view controller’s view.

items.name: videoGravity
items.desc: A string that specifies how the video is displayed within the bounds of the player view controller’s view.

items.name: requiresLinearPlayback
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user is allowed to skip media content.

items.name: unobscuredContentGuide
items.desc: A layout guide representing an area that will not be permanently obscured by fixed-position playback controls when they are visible.

items.name: updatesNowPlayingInfoCenter
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player view controller updates the now playing info center.

items.name: appliesPreferredDisplayCriteriaAutomatically
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver automatically changes the screen's preferred display criteria to that of the asset being played.

items.name: customInfoViewController
items.desc: A view controller that provides client-specific content and controls alongside system-provided information and settings panels.

items.name: contentProposalViewController
items.desc: The view controller responsible for the presentation of content proposals.

items.name: skippingBehavior
items.desc: The behavior triggered by skipping gestures.

items.name: AVPlayerViewControllerSkippingBehavior
items.desc: Constants that represent the player view controller’s skipping behavior.

items.name: isSkipBackwardEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether backward-skipping is available.

items.name: isSkipForwardEnabled
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether forward-skipping is available.

items.name: allowedSubtitleOptionLanguages
items.desc: An optional array of language codes restricting the set of subtitle languages available to the user.

items.name: requiresFullSubtitles
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the user is allowed to disable display of subtitles.

items.name: preparePrerollAds
items.desc: Informs iAd that the application intends to play a preroll ad.

items.name: cancelPreroll
items.desc: Cancels the playback of a preroll video ad.
